All functions

build_train_multi()

Calculates a data frame to train classifiers

calc_features() compile_calc_features()

Calculate filter features

circular_hough_transform() compile_circular_hough()

Calculates a circular hough transform

classify_img()

Classify Images

classify_img_sliced()

Classify images as superpixel slices

clean_image_border()

Makes all the values in the edges of a matrix or image a value

correct_light()

Corrects uniform changes in light

display_filters()

Displays the data from a feature frame

dog_filter() compile_dog_filter()

Calculates the difference of gaussian filter

filter_masks()

Filters small or large objects

generate_edges()

Generate an edge image of a mask, based on an image

generate_overlay()

Generate an overlaid image of a mask and a base image

get_classifications()

Title

compile_hough_circle_draw() hough_circle_draw()

Calculates a circular hough transform and draws the predicted circles

predict_img: Classify pixels based on models and features

Generate superpixel mapping
